title: Biosystems Analysis
description: Analytical methods for modeling biological systems, including white-noise protocols for characterizing nonlinear systems. Crosslisted with BMED, CHE and ECE 4782.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 3500 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHBE 4400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ME 3015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3017 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
